headline.print_headline: Housing Agency to Get State Aid for Security
headline.main: New York Housing Authority to Get State Aid for Security

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo pledged state funding for technical upgrades at some 70 public housing developments after the killing of a police officer in East Harlem on Tuesday.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo says New York City Housing Authority will receive $42 million to improve security at housing projects; announcement follows shooting of Officer Randolph Holder at northern Manhattan public housing complex.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo pledged state funding for technical upgrades at some 70 public housing developments after the killing of a police officer in East Harlem on Tuesday.
